people.title: Grammy Awards 2015: And the Winners Are ...
people.topComment:
The GRAMMY AWARDES USED TO BE ABOUT ( Surprise!) The MUSIC.
Now, it's ALL ABOUT WHO CAN BE THE MOST SHOCKINGLY/SLUTTY Dresser.
It's all RIDICULOUS! IS THERE SUCH LITTLE NEW TALENT, THAT Desperation is the WAY TO GO? Didn't watch, and don't need to. T...
